headline: Truist Financial Maintained a Buy Rating on Zeta Global (ZETA)
summary: Zeta Global Holdings Corp. (NYSE:ZETA) is one of the Best Tech Stocks to Buy Under $20. On July 14, Terry Tillman from Truist Financial maintained a Buy rating on Zeta Global Holdings Corp. headline: Truist strengthens commercial banking, wealth management teams in Florida
summary: Truist Financial Corporation (NYSE: TFC) today announced new leadership for its commercial banking team in Florida and the addition of six new Truist Wealth advisors.

raw.headline: Truist strengthens commercial banking, wealth management teams in Florida

headline: Truist Financial Offers Dependability and Desirable 4.7% Yield
summary: For investors looking for stability and a strong yield, Truist Financial is a top stock to consider.  Headquartered in Charlotte, N.C., Truist provides banking and financial services across 17 states in the Sunbelt and Eastern U.S. While categorized as a regional bank, its scale is significant — ranking among the 10 largest commercial banks in the country.  Unlike many smaller high-yield regional banks, Truist maintains solid credit quality.

headline: Truist Foundation releases multiyear report on strategic philanthropy impact
summary: Today, Truist Foundation released its multiyear impact report, Scaling for Impact, offering data-backed evidence that bold, strategic philanthropy can enhance the economic viability of communities across the Southeast.
